summary:
**Summary:**

"The Other Woman" (2014) is an American comedy about three women (Cameron Diaz, Leslie Mann, and Kate Upton) who discover they're dating the same man (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau). Together, they plot revenge. The movie was directed by Nick Cassavetes and inspired by the 1996 film "The First Wives Club." Filming took place in 2013 in New York and the Bahamas. Despite mixed reviews, it was a hit in theaters, making over $196 million worldwide.
title: The Other Woman (2014 film)
